aircraft.value: Stormbird Attack - AC-8374-446 at Zone-4 Facility

defect_observed.value: Pressure accumulator pre-charge loss. Anomaly detected during routine inspection.

root_cause.value: Environmental exposure causing accelerated degradation of protective coatings

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Flight Control Hydraulics component. Inspection revealed damage to critical components.

corrective_action.value: Conduct detailed inspection of all similar components in fleet

remarks_investigation.value: Comprehensive analysis performed. Root cause identified and verified.

remarks_design.value: Design assessment confirms component operated within specified limits. Recommend enhanced inspection protocol. Date: 15/08/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Eng. K.N. Iyer

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Quality control procedures verified. Recommend periodic surveillance of manufacturing facility. Date: 18/08/2024 Signature: Air Cmde S.B. Rao

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) User perspective considered. Recommend update to operating procedures based on lessons learned. Date: 16/08/2024 Signature: Sqn Ldr A.R. Desai

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) From quality standpoint, root cause analysis is thorough. Corrective measures are appropriate. Concur. Date: 21/08/2024 Signature: Eng. K.N. Iyer

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Design aspects reviewed from certification authority perspective. Investigation is thorough and conclusions are sound. Date: 23/08/2024 Signature: Gp Capt V.S. Pillai

a) Root Cause Analysis: Environmental exposure causing accelerated degradation of protective coatings
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Flight Control Hydraulics component.
Inspection revealed damage to critical components.
c) Remedial Measures Conduct detailed inspection of all similar components in fleet

ii. Preventive Action: Implement condition-based monitoring system
